name: Enertech Aviation & Maritime Academy
about: Enertech Aviation & Maritime Academy is a premier institution dedicated to providing high-quality training in aviation and maritime fields. Established with a mission to meet the growing demand for standardized training, our academy offers a wide range of courses accredited by international standards. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure a comprehensive learning environment, preparing students for successful careers in aviation and maritime industries. With a focus on safety, professionalism, and continuous innovation, we strive to create confident and skilled professionals ready to excel in their chosen fields. Our commitment to excellence and student success sets us apart as a leading training provider.
services:
["Tripod Beta Root Cause Analysis
Construction Safety Trainings
NEBOSH Courses
First Aid Trainings
QP Approved Offshore Trainings
High Field Courses
Awareness Courses"]
